attributes.action: Take action to reduce amount of wildlife killed on roads an motorways.
attributes.additional_details: Animals involved in road traffic accidents end up with a horrific injury or often dying on or nearby the road. Animals being struck on the roads also cause a risk to human life and safety and also costly damage to vehicles.
attributes.background: Roads are built through the natural habitats of lots of Britain's wildlife. More roadkill is being seen everyday and little is being done to prevent animals wandering into the roads.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
